name: MARIO CORPS
description:
Submission to the #LuigikidCreepypastaChallenge2
=======================================
Created with Pixel Game Maker MV
=======================================

A "Dark Parody" of the original Super Mario Bros. 
Explore World 1-1 with a twist.
Based on atmosphere and exploration.

Map included with the files.

COMPLETION TIME: 15-30 minutes

=======================================
CONTROLS
=======================================
WASD  - Movement
SPACE - Interact
